segments.text: What type of people do you work with most effectively ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I tend to work well with people who are confident and straightforward.It ' s more difficult for me to be around timid people , because I move quickly and I am decisive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What things impress you in your colleagues ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I admire and work best with people who are of good character and integrity . I also think confidence and enthusiasm is positive in any business environment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are some of the things your supervisor did that you disliked ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The only thing I really don't like is to get feedback in front of others . I want to hear good and bad feedback in private , so that I have time to think and react to the issue without other distractions . I believe that's the fair way to improve learning or to change future behavior .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you organize and plan for major projects ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love to brainstorm a best , worst , and most likely scenario.Then , I set a timetable that's realistic.What I usually find is that some combination of my schedule easily as these things unfold because I've already visualized what could happen and how I'd react .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Describe an experience when you had to work under great pressure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had to complete an end of quarter report once while I was on the road for two consecutive weeks.The amount of telephoning back and forth was incredible , because I could't bring my office files with me.Luckily I had a great secretary and a logical filling system , so we located everything we needed .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How do you manage your time in a typical day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've always given priority to work with established clients , because they offer a better risk / return value.The last thing I do is general correspondence , especially internal correspondence , which I take care of at the end of the day or week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Describe a time when you acted on someone's suggestion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I changed my open office hours because several of my employees found it difficult to visit me except in the early mornings .
segments.speaker: S2
